Text: All Eyez on Me is the fourth studio album by American rapper 2Pac and the last one to be released during his lifetime.
Triplets:<All Eyez on Me
1:
--------------------
Text: All Eyez on Me:  It was released on February 13, 1996, by Death Row Records and Interscope Records.
Triplets:<All Eyez on Me
2:
--------------------
Text: All Eyez on Me:  The album featured the "Billboard" Hot 100 #1 singles "How Do U Want It" and "California Love".
Triplets:<All Eyez on Me
3:
--------------------
Text: All Eyez on Me:  It featured five singles in all, the most of any of Shakur's albums.
